system.description:
You have blended personal martial skill and leadership techniques to make yourself an example to those who follow you. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Dexterity, Wisdom, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your marshal levels count as adept levels for the purpose of the Extra Attack feature.
  • Half your adept levels count as marshal levels for the purpose of the Combat Directives and Expanded Directives features.
  • Half your marshal levels count as adept levels for the purpose of determining which Focus Feature options you qualify for.
  • You gain an additional benefit based on your Adroit Defense selection:
    • If you chose Agile Defense, you can use your Charisma modifier in place of your Wisdom modifier when calculating your AC if you desire. Choose when you take this feat; once decided, this choice is permanent.
    • If you chose Brutal Defense, choose a martial weapon. It becomes an adept weapon for you.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in adept, 3 levels in marshal
